about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Empire rank 15 long-range frigate “Kraken”
  • Active module Gravitational defence projector
  • Special title “Admiral of Perdition” — for taking part in the most challenging battles and military operations with Kraken.
  • Special ammunition against aliens — “Resonating crystal”, “Resonating charges”, “Resonating slugs” — 30 pcs.
  • Special missiles “Crystal drone” — 30 pcs.
  • Portrait “Molly”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 14 days!

The long-range frigate “Kraken” was created under the vigilant supervision of the Imperial special services. This model was designed without the use of any Alien technology for the single purpose — to destroy aliens. To everyone's surprise, the “pure” technologies from the Earth turned out to be almost as effective as the technologies of the Aliens. While Jericho and the Federation were adjusting to the new discoveries of xenotechnologists, the Empire continued to bend its line. And it has borne fruit — the destructive power of the Kraken’s main weapon surpasses all modern examples. At the moment, “Kraken” is undergoing flight tests and equipment calibration involving the Empire’s most trusted mercenaries.

You won’t find a better ship on the market than “Kraken”. Don’t miss your chance to purchase “Kraken” today and become the best pilot in the universe!

Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Empire rank 15 long-range frigate “Kraken”
  • Active module Gravitational defence projector

  • Special ammunition against aliens — “Resonating crystal”, “Resonating charges”, “Resonating slugs” — 30 pcs.

  • Portrait “Molly”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 14 days!

The long-range frigate “Kraken” was created under the vigilant supervision of the Imperial special services. This model was designed without the use of any Alien technology for the single purpose — to destroy aliens. To everyone's surprise, the “pure” technologies from the Earth turned out to be almost as effective as the technologies of the Aliens. While Jericho and the Federation were adjusting to the new discoveries of xenotechnologists, the Empire continued to bend its line. And it has borne fruit — the destructive power of the Kraken’s main weapon surpasses all modern examples. At the moment, “Kraken” is undergoing flight tests and equipment calibration involving the Empire’s most trusted mercenaries.

You won’t find a better ship on the market than “Kraken”. Don’t miss your chance to purchase “Kraken” today and become the best pilot in the universe!
name: Star Conflict - Kraken

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
